alert.note: Alert for Escambia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 27 at 11:19AM EDT until May 28 at 6:17AM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Alabama... Florida... Perdido River Near Barrineau Park affecting Baldwin and Escambia Counties. For the Perdido River...including Barrineau Park...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Perdido River Near Barrineau Park. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 13 feet, River begins to leave its banks at the parking lot of Adventures Perdido River. Begins to threaten several permanently parked travel trailers. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CDT Friday the stage was 14.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this evening and continue falling to 6.4 feet Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 13 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
